TEXT.TITLE: UAE CENTRAL BANK CD YIELDS RISE
TEXT.BODY: Yields on certificates of deposit (CD) offered by the United Arab Emirates Central Bank were higher than last Monday's offering, the bank said. The one-month CD rose 1/4 point to 6-3/8 pct, while the two, three and six-month maturities rose 5/16 point each to 6-7/16, 6-1/2 and 6-5/8 pct respectively. REUTER
